abstract: Stuart Elliott Advertising column; new kitchen trash bag from Glad is being marketed as an easy step for consumers — it uses less plastic, but it is stronger and costs the same as the old bag.
snippet: A new kitchen trash bag from Glad is being marketed as an easy step for consumers — it uses less plastic, but it’s stronger and costs the same as the old bag.
lead_paragraph: A new kitchen trash bag from Glad is being marketed as an easy step for consumers — it uses less plastic, but it’s stronger and costs the same as the old bag.

headline.main: Glad Cuts the Hyperbole for Its New Green Trash Bag
